case.name: Tojiko Appears
case.description: The Crown Prince's ghost consort has appeared out of hiding to take Miko's cape away.

trigger.state: Let’s take off your cape to start with, Crown Prince.

case.name: Tojiko Tandem
case.description: The Crown Prince's ghost consort has appeared out of hiding to fuck her.

trigger.state: Crown Prince. Isn’t the first rule of politics give the people what they want?
Crown Prince, you know the best way to gather followers is putting on a show!
Have you forgotten, Crown Prince, your own body’s desires?
